channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.8.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: v0.8.0, 8th, July 2022 Open Cluster Management team is proud to annouce the release of OCM v0.8.0! It includes several enhancement on core components and addons. Notable changes including: ManifestWork update strategy: now user can set ServerSideApply or CreateOnly as the manifest update strategy to resolve potential resource conflict in ManifestWork.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.
